Source: Reuters

Description: Amazon's positive numbers boosted sentiment on Wall Street Friday after a mixed week of big-tech earnings, as shares of the online retail and cloud computing giant surged almost 15%. This report produced by Chris Dignam.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3J7vVZ9
